remarks: Join value.  Since both sides evaluate to ` (/) ` when they don't exist, for convenience we drop the ` { X , Y } e. dom U ` requirement. (Contributed by NM, 9-Sep-2018.)
statement:
joindef.u $e |- U = ( lub ` K ) $.
joindef.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
joindef.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
joindef.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. W ) $.
joindef.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. Z ) $.
joinval $p |- ( ph -> ( X .\/ Y ) = ( U ` { X , Y } ) ) $.
